north.short_desc: There's a queen-size bed, simple but clean looking,
north.long_desc: The bed looks nice enough - nothing fancy, but not a disaster either. Two pillows, a spare blanket at the foot of the bed. There's a small bedside drawer to each side, and a painting above the bed.

east.short_desc: a television and two decent sized windows overlooking the city
east.long_desc: Against the wall is a large television, sitting between two decent sized windows overlooking the city. The curtains are drawn.

south.short_desc: a door, likely to a bathroom
south.long_desc: There's a door, lightly sun-yellowed. Nondescript; fair to assume it's a bathroom door.

west.short_desc: the door out of the room, likely to the hallway
west.long_desc: There's a standard hotel room door, with the fire escape route poster on the back and an empty coat hook.

city hotel room.descrip: You're in a 'budget' PPPhotel roomEEE; small but pleasant enough, at least to sleep in. The sound of traffic tells you you're a couple of floors up at least, and the carpet is well-trod

north.long_desc: This is the north part of a tree...

east.long_desc: This is the east of a forked tree. Not sure what's here. Maybe a bird's nest..

south.long_desc: South of a tree. Should probably be the exit.

west.short_desc: what looks like a a western tree part
west.long_desc: West of the tree. Maybe a very nice view...

forked tree branch.descrip: You've climbed up a gnarled old tree to a PPPforked tree branchEEE, and found a relatively safe place to sit in its broad branches.

item_desc.generic: There's a dark fence blocking the horizon, prominently featuring
item_desc.gate: a heavy wrought-iron [[]] - standing strong but run-down
item_desc.padlock: an old dark-metal [[]] on a chain, holding the gate closed

north.long_desc: You think you could leave through the large wrought-iron gates to the north. They're imposing but run-down; this graveyard doesn't get as much love as it could.

item_desc.generic: You see a variety of headstones, most quite worn, and
item_desc.glass jar: a [[]] being used as a vase in front of one of the headstones, with some dried flowers left long ago
item_desc.no_items: not much else. It's quite empty here...

east.long_desc: You see a variety of headstones, most quite worn and decorated by clumps of moss. There's a glass jar being used as a vase in front of one of the headstones, with dried flowers left long ago.

south.long_desc: There's a locked mausoleum here; graffiti that looks years-old and weeds sprouting at every crevice of the marble.

item_desc.generic: Standing in unkempt long grass, you see what looks like

west.shed door: a wooden [[]] that looks like it was barricaded until recently
west.short_desc: is what looks like a work shed of some kind
west.long_desc: There's a work shed, with a wheelbarrow outside and a large padlock on the door.

graveyard.descrip: You're in a rather poorly kept PPPgraveyardEEE - smaller than you might have expected given the scale of the gate and fences

north.short_desc: A wooden shrine, with aged fabric flags and various trinkets
north.long_desc: The shrine itself is fragile looking, with candles still not burnt down entirely.

east.short_desc: a small 'interior' wall of the underhang
east.long_desc: The underhang's east wall is damp with spray from the waterfall outside, but otherwise unremarkable

south.long_desc: The sky and fields beyond; nothing much to do here except leave.

shrine.descrip: Sheltered from the rain you see a small PPPshrineEEE, built into the underhang of a cliff face.

work shed.missing_cardinal: There's not much else to see around here. Dusty and largely disused, nothing really catches your eye.

item_desc.generic: A simple structure, with a dusty window in one wall over a cluttered desk. On the desk, there's
item_desc.local map: a yellowed [[]], showing the region surrounding the graveyard
item_desc.no_items: not much of any real interest.

north.short_desc: There's a simple desk, hazily lit by the window over it

secateurs.description: Slightly rusted secateurs, still likely sharp enough to do their job.

iron key.description: An old iron key, pitted on the surface but still appears functional.

work shed.descrip: Around you, you see the interior of a rather run-down looking PPPwork shedEEE, previously boarded up but seemingly, not anymore.
